# localizationCode

**Instance Property**

A device localization code that specifies the HID compliant localization code.

## Declaration

```swift
let localizationCode: HIDDeviceLocalizationCode?
```

## Discussion

The localization code can specify the specific format a device is localized. For example, a Japanese (JIS) keyboard should declare the [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceLocalizationCode/japan] localization code.
title: localizationCode
